metadata.title: PM felicitates newly elected German Chancellor

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 06 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday felicitated the newly elected German Chancellor for winning the polls and expressed his warm wishes for his success and German nation's progress ahead under his leadership. The prime minister wrote on his official X wall separately in English and German languages as, "Congratulations to @FriedrichMerz on his election as the Chancellor of Germany! Wishing him success in leading Germany towards greater progress and prosperity." Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif extended his warm regards and keenness to working closely with the newly elected German Chancellor to further strengthen Pakistan-Germany relations and enhance bilateral cooperation across all areas of mutual interest.
